//Author: Mustafa Filmwala, Contest: Wild Card,Clash Credenz
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
   int t,i,j,temp,count=1,n;
    string name[100001];
	map<string,int> mp;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
		cin>>name[i];
	
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
		{
		mp[name[i]]++;
		if(mp[name[i]]==count){cout<<count<<" "<<name[i]<<endl;count++;}
		}
		
    
return 0;
}
